story.name: DownloadCSVfile.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:Start to login the Openl10n site Given Delete all cookies before start testing When the user has opened the Openl10n webpage Then the user enters username 15202184317@qq.com and password 123qwe!@#QWE to Openl10n login page Then click the Login submit button of Openl10n Page Then the Openl10n main page should be displayed
Scenario:Download the CSV file for one specific product @feature Download Then select product as 'PPM' Then select version as '9.50' Then select language as 'Finnish' Then click 'Download' button
